Uproar gently Tears off another small piece of fish and gives it to Silvers=
tar and another one for Sirius.  He cleans the rest of the fish and then ma=
kes it into tiny bite sized chunks.  Straightshot takes a few strips and ho=
lds them in her hand, waiting for the babies to chew their food carefully b=
efore feeding them more.

" Wow, great job Uproar.  They are eating this up=
. "

Uproar smiles as he watches them eat.

" No problem, I'm glad they lik=
e it."

Local artist who specializes in illustration, using traditional and=
 digital media.  

I also specialize in hand made crafts.  Great for any oc=
casion!  

Need a great gift idea that is original?  No problem!  Email me =
at this address and we will talk.
